body:
About me
========
My name's Derrick, I'm 15 years old.
I have experience in C++ and C# and I'm currently working on a few personal projects here.

Active projects
===============
[Kroz](lumpbloom7.github.io/Kroz) - A text-based adventure game.(Currently private, with plans to make it open-source)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
